00035 #include "FitzHughNagumo1961OdeSystem.hpp"
00036 #include "OdeSystemInformation.hpp"
00037 #include <cmath>
00038 
00039 //
00040 // Model-scope constant parameters
00041 //
00042 const double FitzHughNagumo1961OdeSystem::mAlpha = -0.08;
00043 const double FitzHughNagumo1961OdeSystem::mGamma = 3.00;
00044 const double FitzHughNagumo1961OdeSystem::mEpsilon = 0.005;
00045 
00046 
00047 FitzHughNagumo1961OdeSystem::FitzHughNagumo1961OdeSystem(
00048         boost::shared_ptr<AbstractIvpOdeSolver> pOdeSolver,
00049         boost::shared_ptr<AbstractStimulusFunction> pIntracellularStimulus)
00050     : AbstractCardiacCell(pOdeSolver, 2, 0, pIntracellularStimulus)
00051 {
00052     mpSystemInfo = OdeSystemInformation<FitzHughNagumo1961OdeSystem>::Instance();
00053 
00054     Init();
00055 }
00056 
00057 FitzHughNagumo1961OdeSystem::~FitzHughNagumo1961OdeSystem(void)
00058 {
00059 }
00060 
00061 void FitzHughNagumo1961OdeSystem::EvaluateYDerivatives(double time, const std::vector<double> &rY, std::vector<double>& rDY)
00062 {
00063     double membrane_V = rY[0]; // v
00064     double recovery_variable = rY[1]; // w
00065 
00066     double i_stim = GetIntracellularAreaStimulus(time);
00067 
00068     // dV/dt
00069     double membrane_V_prime = 0;
00070     // do not update voltage if the mSetVoltageDerivativeToZero flag has been set
00071     if (!mSetVoltageDerivativeToZero)
00072     {
00073         membrane_V_prime = membrane_V*(membrane_V-mAlpha)*(1-membrane_V)-recovery_variable+i_stim;
00074     }
00075 
00076     // dw/dt
00077     double recovery_variable_prime = mEpsilon*(membrane_V-mGamma*recovery_variable);
00078 
00079     rDY[0] = membrane_V_prime;
00080     rDY[1] = recovery_variable_prime;
00081 }
00082 
00083 double FitzHughNagumo1961OdeSystem::GetIIonic(const std::vector<double>* pStateVariables)
00084 {
00085     if (!pStateVariables) pStateVariables = &mStateVariables;
00086     double membrane_V = (*pStateVariables)[mVoltageIndex];
00087     double recovery_variable = (*pStateVariables)[1];
00088     double fake_ionic_current = membrane_V*(membrane_V-mAlpha)*(1-membrane_V)-recovery_variable;
00089     return fake_ionic_current;
00090 }

00095 template<>
00096 void OdeSystemInformation<FitzHughNagumo1961OdeSystem>::Initialise(void)
00097 {
00098     /*
00099      * State variables
00100      */
00101     this->mVariableNames.push_back("V");
00102     this->mVariableUnits.push_back("mV");
00103     this->mInitialConditions.push_back(0.0);
00104 
00105     this->mVariableNames.push_back("w");
00106     this->mVariableUnits.push_back("");
00107     this->mInitialConditions.push_back(0.0);
00108 
00109     this->mInitialised = true;
00110 }
